channel.title: Pk - Reality | 317 Pk Server |
channel.description:
[size=36pt]Pk - Reality Advertisement[/size] Server Links: Webclient: Moved to new webhost will be up soon! Download Client: www.sendspace.com/file/gglxth Forums: http://s4.zetaboards.com/Pk_Reality/index/ [center]- ::master - - Instant Switching - - Clue Scrolls - - Great Pkp Shop - - Shops with all the provisions needed for pking - - Achievement System (Pking and bosses, works like milestones) - - Killstreaks which give rewards and increased pk points - - Pvp drops (statuettes) that can give up to 250 pk points! - - Perfect Duel Arena with 0 dupes! - - perfect models and rotations for newer items - - Rapidly growing community compete against great bridders and pkers - - Daily 2 hours of double pkp (handled by time relative to the vps) - - Highscores - - Auto-Donations - - Non-Cheatable Voting system with rewards - - Bossing spread around wilderness - - Slayer System with slayer shop - - Over 150 Players registered on forums -- Great economy MONEY IS ACTUALLY WORTH SOMETHING! - - SERVER IS 100% ONLINE ONLY DOWN FOR UPDATES - - REGULAR CONTENT UPDATES -[/center] Some Eye Candy [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/823/pkpshop1.png/][IMG]http://img823.imageshack.us/img823/8629/pkpshop1.png[/img][/URL]
Uploaded with [URL=http://imageshack.us]ImageShack.us[/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/38/pkingcountdown.png/][IMG]http://img38.imageshack.us/img38/9315/pkingcountdown.png[/img][/URL]
Uploaded with [URL=http://imageshack.us]ImageShack.us[/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/248/47115447.png/][IMG]http://img248.imageshack.us/img248/1237/47115447.png[/img][/URL]
Uploaded with [URL=http://imageshack.us]ImageShack.us[/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/201/21443314.png/][IMG]http://img201.imageshack.us/img201/7916/21443314.png[/img][/URL]
Uploaded with [URL=http://imageshack.us]ImageShack.us[/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/11/44456618.png/][IMG]http://img11.imageshack.us/img11/4310/44456618.png[/img][/URL]

loved:

Whats the point having customs they look really gay and just suck. Also why would you have a old game frame when your content is at a higher revision don’t look right, and just looks like a bunch of tutorials try doing someone to seperate yourself from the other servers

[size=36pt]Pk - Reality Advertisement[/size]
Server Links:
Webclient: Moved to new webhost will be up soon!
Download Client: www.sendspace.com/file/gglxth
Forums: http://s4.zetaboards.com/Pk_Reality/index/
[center]- ::master -

  • Instant Switching -
  • Clue Scrolls -
  • Great Pkp Shop -
  • Shops with all the provisions needed for pking -
  • Achievement System (Pking and bosses, works like milestones) -
  • Killstreaks which give rewards and increased pk points -
  • Pvp drops (statuettes) that can give up to 250 pk points! -
  • Perfect Duel Arena with 0 dupes! -
  • perfect models and rotations for newer items -
  • Rapidly growing community compete against great bridders and pkers -
  • Daily 2 hours of double pkp (handled by time relative to the vps) -
  • Highscores -
  • Auto-Donations -
  • Non-Cheatable Voting system with rewards -
  • Bossing spread around wilderness -
  • Slayer System with slayer shop -
  • Over 150 Players registered on forums – Great economy MONEY IS ACTUALLY WORTH SOMETHING! -
  • SERVER IS 100% ONLINE ONLY DOWN FOR UPDATES -
  • REGULAR CONTENT UPDATES -[/center]
    Some Eye Candy
